Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Plugins > HarmonixMidi > HarmonixMidi

References

   
Module HarmonixMidi
Header /Engine/Plugins/Runtime/Harmonix/Source/HarmonixMidi/Public/HarmonixMidi/MidiMsg.h
Include #include "HarmonixMidi/MidiMsg.h"

Syntax

USTRUCT ()  
struct FMidiMsg

Remarks

A class representing a single standard midi message. This class is tiny and tightly packed to keep the midi data footprint small on disk and in memory.

Variables

  Type Name Description
union FMidiMsg Use a union instead of subclassing MidiMsg so that MidiMsg is constant size and therefore you can have a vector.
